S2 E10 From Out Of The Rain
i'm gonna barf more backstory here because i kinda like this?
where shifters are known to exist but it's basically treated like a mental illness
and john is bitten on a case and sherlock is all
ok there is actually nothing wrong with mental illness
so if that's what this is we can handle it
and he decides he's gonna study john during his shift
the thing is that it's actually really unclear when the shifting will present itself
so john keeps having symptoms but no actual event
and sherlock is investigating and collecting data
and kinda starts to think that john's not going to shift after all
but then the shift comes very suddenly
and is really intense and basically sherlock is NOT PREPARED
and he tries all the things he's thinking will work
and he tries things that the medical contemporaries suggest
and in this AU shifts last from 3-5 days minimum but could just...keep going
it's day 5 and john is still in were!form
and people are pressuring sherlock to hospitalize john because what if he hurts himself
and sherlock runs and takes john with him
and tries the last possible thing he thinks might work
less hurt and more comfort at this point
